[[<]]
> **Filename:** mmits.mp4, mmits.png
> **Author:** IronShears
> **License:** https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
> **Source Link:** https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7109110879618108718?is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1&lang=en
> **Derivative of:** SCP-7XXX by fabledtiefling
[[/<]]
-----

This one's cute. Makes me melancholic. Reminds me of all those people I met while camping as a child who I'll never see again.

I love the characters and basically all of my friends who don't keep up with SCP stuff that I've shown this article had roughly the same reaction about Carteckan & Sias's drawings and the ending. It's good I don't wanna spoil anything else. Just read it.

One thing though, I will say I am confused as to how Sias has an adult daughter at 30 but I mean. There's a lot of reasons that could be, more so in an SCP article but it did occupy a few brain cells through the whole article because there is not explanation.

idk why but my brain went straight to cryogenic freezing even though there's a dozen less high sci-fi explanations that would make significantly more sense being slipped in without an explanation.

+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
author: IronShears
